== PayPal ==

=== Account ===

Access to our LoCo PayPal account will be very stringently handed out. Only those who will be directly managing financial costs will be allowed access.

=== Transaction History ===

ALL transactions MUST have a note of what was sold, what cost it was sold at, and what the shipping cost was.

A notice of the transaction must also be submitted to the mailing list with a link to the action date.

A transaction summary must also be noted in the Wiki at <nowiki>[[ SouthDakotaTeam-Treasury-Transactions ]]</nowiki>.

=== Notice ===

* NO member of the Treasury is to be a member of the Warehouse.
* There MUST be communication between these two groups to keep an accurate history of products and transactions.

=== Logs ===

All transactions MUST be logged.
